title.description: The main title of the resource

description.description: A brief summary or excerpt to display on the card

subcategories.description: Array of subcategories from any category

resource_type.description: Defines the nature of the resource and dictates the CTA button text/action

target_url.description: The URL for the resource itself (download link, YouTube/Vimeo embed code, or external website URL)

open_in_new_tab.description: For external_link type: whether to open in a new tab or same window

image_url.description: A URL for a thumbnail or preview image to display on the resource card

release_date.description: When the resource should be released/made available to users. Resources with future dates are scheduled for release.

is_public.description: A flag to control visibility - if false, only members can see it

allowed_role_ids.description: Array of role IDs that can access this resource. Empty array means all roles can access (when is_public is false)

tags.description: For more granular search or filtering

author_id.description: ID of the member or team member who authored this resource

author_name.description: Name of the author (cached for display)

folder_id.description: Reference to ResourceFolder entity - the folder this resource belongs to

status.description: Publication status - draft resources are not visible to end users
